en_US.NDCFormat: is not a valid NDC. It must be an 11 digit number that is not 00000000000.
en_US.GreaterThanEqualZero: must be greater than or equal to zero.
en_US.ValueLessThanZero: The value of {0} cannot be less than zero.
en_US.ValueNotSupplied: A value for {0} must be entered.
en_US.CannotConvertType: The value, {0}, cannot be converted to type of {1}.
en_US.InvalidValue: The value, '{0}', is not allowed. Valid values
en_US.MinExclusive: The value, {0}, is less than or equal to the allowed minimum value of {1}.
en_US.MinInclusive: The value, {0}, is less than the allowed minimum value of {1}.
en_US.MaxExclusive: The value, {0}, is greater than or equal to the allowed maximum value of {1}.
en_US.MaxInclusive: The value, {0}, is greater than the allowed maximum value of {1}.
en_US.MinLength: The value, {0}, is less than the allowed minimum length of {1}.
en_US.MaxLength: The value, {0}, is greater than the allowed maximum length of {1}.
en_US.InvalidTransformParameter: is not a valid transform parameter.
en_US.NoDataType: No data type specified for the constraint {0}.
en_US.AttributeNameRequired: A name is required for all schema attributes.
